posts.postText: Why'd you demote Storm as the Movie Theatre Team usergroup leader AND set his default rank to "registered user"?
He apparently got perma-banned for prop killing.
and for ESP, Bhop scripts and a backdoor in the anticheat.

>> Why'd you demote Storm as the Movie Theatre Team usergroup leader AND set his default rank to "registered user"?â€‰
He has been cheating in TTT for awhile, breaking rules, and recently he added a hidden backdoor to the anticheat. After I confronted him about it, he went on lying for awhile and eventually gave up.
Should i move the forum for his server to the recycle bin, delete the movie theatre team usergroup & rank, and remove it from NNJG documents & steam group description?
